div.h2: 1st Graders Find New Ways of Learning

div.p: Riverdale 1st graders keep busy learning at home

img.alt: 1st Graders Find New Ways of Learning

div.p: This document will explain expectations of E-Learning and give details about Chromebook pickup
Classes will not resume until May 1st

div.h2: Lunch Distributions: Meals Available for Pickup Mondays & Wednesdays

div.p: Meals Available for Pickup Mondays & Wednesdays

img.alt: Lunch Distributions: Meals Available for Pickup Mondays & Wednesdays

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: Pre-K through 5th grade students begin their education at Riverdale Elementary School.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: 6th through 8th grade students prepare for success at Riverdale Middle School.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: 9th through 12th grade students become lifelong learners at Riverdale High School.

figure.blockquote: The mission of the Riverdale Community Unit School District 100 is to provide each student a quality education in a safe, supportive environment that promotes self-discipline, motivation, and excellence in learning. Students are empowered to take a responsible role in their own education, home, and community through diverse learning experiences.
